RelatedSentence: Ed Tech is staffed completely by volunteers who are mostly information technology professionals .

Since its founding in 2003 , the foundation has helped Western New York children in more than 90 schools and community centers by providing and installing computers , servers , networks , smartboards and infrastructure .
